item.description:
Hello everyone. We will be hosting two locations again for the December meetup. For those who attended the November meeting , Thank you and I hope you all had a good time.

Once again, please note that we do have a cap on the number of RSVP's for Doggie Day. Please keep in mind that Brookline can also accommodate ~10 members. So please be sure to list which venue you will be attending.
Thanks again, See you soon....
- S & S

Locations:

1. Doggie Day - 11am -- 400 Tremont Street in Boston
2. Paws for a Cause - 10:30am -- 1386 Beacon Street in Brookline (Coolidge Corner)
item.name: The Boston Chihuahua December Meetup
